mapper.select:
select jzh_depot_item.header_id, group_concat(concat(jzh_material.name,' ',ifnull(jzh_material.standard,''),' ',ifnull(jzh_material.model,''))) as materialsList from jzh_depot_item left join jzh_material on jzh_depot_item.material_id = jzh_material.Id and ifnull(jzh_material.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' where 1=1
and jzh_depot_item.header_id in
#{item}
and ifnull(jzh_depot_item.delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by jzh_depot_item.header_id

select header_id, sum(oper_number) materialCount from jzh_depot_item where 1=1
and header_id in
#{item}
and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by header_id

select dh.link_number number, ifnull(sum(dh.deposit),0) finishDeposit from jzh_depot_head dh where 1=1
and dh.link_number in
#{item}
and ifnull(dh.delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by dh.link_number
select count(s.id) from jzh_depot_head dh left join jzh_serial_number s on dh.number=s.in_bill_no where dh.number = #{number} and (s.out_bill_no is not null or s.out_bill_no!='')
